The Elder Nāḷāgiri’s Birth Story
“The One of Golden Beauty,
the receiver of offerings,
I saw the Leader of the World
going along with Nāḷāgiri.
Taking a garland of nāḷa flowers,
as I was leaving at that time,
there I saw the Buddha,🔽who had crossed over the flood, who was without pollutants.

analyzed: pasanna cittaḥ sumanaḥ  naḷa mālam apūjayi
translated: With a confident mind, full of joy,🔽I worshipped the garland of nāḷa flowers,
the Great Hero who is worthy of offerings,
the one who has compassion for the whole world.
For thirty-one eons from now,
the garland I offered then,
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of worshipping the Buddha.
My pollutants are ended,
all my existences have been uprooted,
like an elephant who has broken his bonds,
I live without pollutants.
How welcome it was for me
to come into the presence of the Buddha!
The three knowledges have been attained,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been accomplished.
The four analytical insights,
and the eight liberations,
the six super-knowledges have been realized,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been accomplished.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā naḷamāliyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā naḷamāliyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus has the venerable Nalamali told this story in verse.
